page.title: 09Patterns of Work
page.content: Both my mum and dad are unemployed. Mom worked in a factory where they cut foam for cushions etc. but she stopped work when she was expecting me. Six years later she worked at home soldering parts for machinery, but she gave it up after a couple of years. My dad used to work on a JCB digger. He's been out of work for six years. If mom or dad got a job I would be very pleased. My dad works on building sites all over the place. His firm is Comben Homes He travels to work on a minibus which picks everybody up. He starts work at 0830 and gets home at 1710. At about 1300 they have their dinner in a canteen. My dad's firm used to be Whittinghams but Comben Homes took them over. My sister works on Hednesford Market. She says that she gets ninety pounds a week!
